body: Damn good, I wasn't expecting the hypnosis. She really pulled an Uno card
@EvolutionKills just ignore him he is talking shit

@tester1337 - It was a story that seemed like it was going to fetishize virginity, until it pulled the rug out from under that trope. Also, the last three pages are nothing but the inversion of expectation. In so far as one-shot stories in hentai go, that's pretty fun and creative. It's really easy to fall into lazy tropes, but Mikami tried a bit harder than that. I mean, how many other 'daughter RPG's  father and Yakuza thugs to save the day and her boyfriend' have you seen?
Wow, a good artist who has more than one style of story and has realistic human interactions. This is a rare gem.
ye, last one is pretty good - "she randomly lost her virginity at school just to riot against her parent, she also allows to cum inside whoever first time doing her"...."story" in hentai lmao
